_contextTesting.fork.description:
This method will fork a process, and pass the inputs when `stdin` expects an input. Because `includeAnswers` is set to `true` by default, the answers will be included in the resulting `stdout` and `stderr` properties.
    Returns the result of the work, updated to contain answers in the interactive mode.

_contextTesting.ForkResult.description: The output of the fork method.

_contextTesting.Preprocessor.description: The function which processes fork's outputs before returning them for asserts.

_contextTesting.Context.description: A context made with a constructor.
